short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collects the titles of all the items on an Etsy page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Etsy Title Collector is the perfect Chrome extension for anyone who needs to quickly and efficiently gather product titles from Etsy. Whether you're a seller, researcher, or simply love curating products, Etsy Title Collector allows you to collect all product titles on any Etsy page with a single click, saving you valuable time.

Key Features:
üõçÔ∏è One-Click Etsy Title Collection: Automatically gather all product titles from any Etsy page in seconds.
üìÑ Downloadable Formats: Instantly export your collected Etsy product titles as a neatly organized .txt file.
üöÄ Streamline Your Workflow: Perfect for Etsy sellers, researchers, and marketers looking to quickly compile product title data.
üéØ User-Friendly Interface: A simple, intuitive popup lets you collect Etsy product titles effortlessly without the hassle of manual copying.
üîç Ideal for Market Research: Easily collect and analyze product titles to optimize your listings, stay competitive, and gain insights.

How It Works:
- Visit any Etsy page containing product listings.
- Click on the Etsy Title Collector icon in your browser.
- Hit the "Download Titles" button in the popup.

The extension will gather all the product titles from the current page and download them to your device in a clean and simple .txt file.

Whether you're looking to optimize your Etsy shop, gather market research, or simply organize your favorite product listings, Etsy Title Collector is your go-to tool. Make your Etsy browsing more productive with this fast and efficient extension!
